Class LinearScanRKNNQuery<O>

  • java.lang.Object

    O - Database object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, LinearScanQuery, RKNNQuery<O>

extends AbstractRKNNQuery<O>
implements LinearScanQuery
    Default linear scan RKNN query class.

    Erich Schubert
